content: 12 decrease around 6 fasten_off yarn weave in end and get ready to start the tentacles the tentacles are surface crocheted onto the body of the octopus using the front loops of round 10 1 join yarn to back of octopus b ody you will be able to see where rounds 9 and 10 meet on the back as it is crocheted in rounds and the blo will not match up 100%- this is where y ou will join 2 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 1- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch 3 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 2- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch 4 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 3- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch 5 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 4- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch 6 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 5- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch 7 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 6- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch 8 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 7- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch 9 sl in next 2 st then chain 9 tentacle 8- 3sc in 2nd chain from hook and ea st back to body then sl to body in next blo stitch sl to where you joined yarn fasten_off and weave in ends congratulations you have made your very own doc the emotional support octopus feel free to sell your finished product- you made it after all i do ask however that you do not reuse any of my images you do not sell this pattern that you do not reproduce any part of this pattern for distribution and that you give designer credit to @browncoatcrafting on your listings and social media posts
